hibernate-mapping.query: select vvd.VolumeDayDate from ValidatedVolumeDay vvd where vvd.Workload = :workload and vvd.VolumeDayDate between :startDate and :endDate

select wldb.CurrentDate from WorkloadDay wldb inner join wldb.Parent sdb where wldb.Workload = :workload and wldb.TemplateReference.TemplateName = :longtermKey and wldb.CurrentDate between :startDate and :endDate and sdb.Scenario = :scenario

select wldb.CurrentDate from WorkloadDay wldb inner join wldb.Parent sdb where wldb.Workload = :workload and (wldb.TemplateReference.TemplateName is null OR wldb.TemplateReference.TemplateName <> :longtermKey) and wldb.CurrentDate between :startDate and :endDate and sdb.Scenario = :scenario
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select sk.Name as Name, sk.Id as Id, sdb.SkillDayDate as CurrentDate from Skill sk left join SkillDay sdb on (sk.Id=sdb.Skill) and (sdb.SkillDayDate between :startDate and :endDate) and (sdb.Scenario = :scenario) left join WorkloadDay wld on (wld.Parent = sdb.Id) and (wld.TemplateName is null OR wld.TemplateName <> :longtermKey) left join WorkloadDayBase wldb on wld.WorkloadDayBase = wldb.Id where sk.IsDeleted = 0 and sk.BusinessUnit = :businessUnit group by sk.Name, sk.Id, sdb.SkillDayDate
